Sentencas: In this paper, a conceptual hybrid biomass gasification system is developed to produce hydrogen and is exergoeconomically analyzed.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The system is based on steam biomass gasification with the lumped solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and solid oxide electrolyser cell (SOEC) subsystem as the core components.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The gasifier gasifies sawdust in a steam medium and operates at a temperature range of 1023-1423 K and near atmospheric pressure.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The analysis is conducted for a specific steam biomass ratio of 0.8 kmol-steam/kmol-biomass.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The gasification process is assumed to be self-thermally standing.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The pressurized SOFC and SOEC are of planar types and operate at 1000 K and 1.2 bar.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The system can produce multi-outputs, such as hydrogen (with a production capacity range of 21.8-25.2 kgh(-1)), power and heat.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The internal hydrogen consumption in the lumped SOFC-SOEC subsystem increases from 8.1 to 8.6 kg/h.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The SOFC performs an efficiency of 50.3% and utilizes the hydrogen produced from the steam that decomposes in the SOEC.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: The exergoeconomic analysis is performed to investigate and describe the exergetic and economic interactions between the system components through calculations of the unit exergy cost of the process streams.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: It obtains a set of cost balance equations belonging to an exergy flow with material streams to and from the components which constitute the system.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: Solving the developed cost balance equations provides the cost values of the exergy streams.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production

Sentencas: For the gasification temperature range and the electricity cost of 0.1046 $/kWh considered, the unit exergy cost of hydrogen ranges from 0.258 to 0.211 $/kWh.
Titulo: Exergoeconomic analysis of a hybrid system based on steam biomass gasification products for hydrogen production
